title: Group dialog should be displayed even if dataset is not set
description: When a table report item is added but the dataset is not set, the group dialog should still be accessible to the user. Currently, the group dialog is not displayed if the dataset is not defined.
OB: When a table report item is added without setting a dataset and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog is not shown.
EB: When a table report item is added without setting a dataset and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog should be displayed.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
3. Verify that the group dialog is displayed.
